custom-sql.sql: SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FOLDER_ID$]
SELECT {DLFileEntry.*} FROM DLFileEntry WHERE (fileEntryId NOT IN( SELECT classPK FROM Asset WHERE classNameId = [$CLASS_NAME_ID_COM.LIFERAY.PORTLET.DOCUMENTLIBRARY.MODEL.DLFILEENTRY$] ))
( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFolder WHERE [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT COUNT(*) AS COUNT_VALUE FROM DLFileShortcut WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] )

( SELECT folderId AS modelFolderId, name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT toFolderId AS modelFolderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY modelFolder DESC, title ASC

( SELECT folderId AS modelFolderId, name AS name, name AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 1 AS modelFolder FROM DLFolder WHERE [$FOLDER_PARENT_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT folderId AS modelFolderId, name AS name, title AS title, 0 AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileEntry WHERE [$FILE_ENTRY_FOLDER_ID$] ) UNION ALL ( SELECT toFolderId AS modelFolderId, toName AS name, DLFileEntry.title AS title, fileShortcutId AS fileShortcutId, 0 AS modelFolder FROM DLFileShortcut INNER JOIN DLFileEntry ON (DLFileEntry.folderId = DLFileShortcut.toFolderId) AND (DLFileEntry.name = DLFileShortcut.toName) WHERE [$FILE_SHORTCUT_FOLDER_ID$] ) ORDER BY modelFolder DESC, title ASC
